data.text: Copyright and reuse: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0. This is an educational resource designed and developed to provide access to information on European sport cinema. Information included in this database is based on Open Source data publicly available on websites and databases. All efforts have been made to ensure that content is included in line with copyright provisions, but please contact sportineuropeancinema@gmail.com if there are any copyright issues with content displayed on this platform and the relevant content will immediately be removed.
